mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, INVEN_ID, BOOK_ID, STORAGE_ID, STORE_ID, REFUND_ID, PREV_INVEN_ID, INCREASE, CURR_INVEN, INVEN_DATE, CLASSIFY, REMARK FROM (SELECT * FROM INVENTORY ORDER BY INVEN_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{ startRow } AND #{ endRow }
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INVENTORY WHERE INVEN_DATE between to_date(#{ begin }) and to_date(#{ end }) + 1 - 1/86400
